message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. Given its worth, I'm offering it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $18,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
